snippet.name: Create an array of locations
snippet.starttext: <cfset locations = [] /> <cfloop array="#response.users#" index="friend"> <cfset friendLocation = {} /> <!--- use cached version of location ---> <cfset friendGeo = objectLoad("geoCode_#friend.screen_name#.obj") /> <cfif friendGeo.status EQ "OK"> <cfset friendLocation.longitude=geoCode.longitude /> <cfset friendLocation.latitude=geoCode.latitude /> <cfset friendLocation.screenName=friend.screen_name /> <cfset ArrayAppend(locations,friendLocation) /> </cfif> </cfloop>
